data.name: NumberingRules
desc: provides access to the numbering rules.
Numbering rules may be set at a Paragraph object. The numbering rules are levels of property values. Each level contains equal properties.

properties.name: DefaultListId
desc: id of default list for the numbering rules instance

properties.name: IsAbsoluteMargins
desc: determines if the margins are absolute or relative to the preceding numbering level.

properties.name: IsAutomatic
desc: determines if the numbering rules are automatically created as opposed to numbering rules that are part of a numbering style.

properties.name: IsContinuousNumbering
desc: determines if the numbering levels are counted continuously or if each numbering level is counted separately.

properties.name: Name
desc: contains the name of the numbering rules.
It is used to identify a certain numbering rules property

properties.name: NumberingIsOutline
desc: This numbering is used in the outline of the document (e.g.

properties.name: NumberingType
desc: the type of numbering (Arabic, characters, roman numbers, etc.).
